definition: silky envelope spun by the larvae of many insects to protect pupas and by spiders to protect eggs, to wrap in or as if in a cocoon, as for protection
details:
noun
- silky envelope spun by the larvae of many insects to protect pupas and by spiders to protect eggs
verb
- to wrap in or as if in a cocoon, as for protection
- to retreat as if into a cocoon, as from an unfriendly environment
= example: to retreat as if into a cocoon, as from an unfriendly environment
